scripts.install:all: pnpm i --no-frozen-lockfile && cd poll && pnpm i --frozen-lockfile && cd ../syrian-contributors && pnpm i --no-frozen-lockfile
scripts.build:poll: cd poll && pnpm -s link:static && pnpm build
scripts.build: pnpm -C poll -s link:static && pnpm build:poll && pnpm build:syrian-contributors
scripts.start:poll: cd poll && pnpm -s link:static && pnpm -s start:migrate
scripts.start: pnpm start:poll & pnpm start:syrian-contributors & pnpm start:proxy & wait
scripts.dev: cd poll && pnpm -s link:static && pnpm dev
